name: Shades of Azure
summary: This is a mapset with the following traits/gimmicks/whatever; All map titles are one word and end on the letter T, except for MAP32. The maps are primarily coated in blue, using textures from 32in24-15tex & OTEX. Some maps might have a semi-speedmap feel to them, with sparse detailing. Some maps are easy, some are hard; but all except two of them can be knocked out in less than 15-20 minutes.
